sentence.text: In this study, we investigated whether single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) rs7521902, rs10859871 and rs11031006, mapping to negative regulation of gene expression, cell-cell adhesion and G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway genetic loci, respectively, are associated with risk for endometriosis in a Greek population.
Evidence for association with endometriosis was also found for the AC genotype of the rs10859871 of cell-cell adhesion.

Notably, a significant difference in the distribution of the AG genotype and the positive regulation of glucose transmembrane transport allele A of G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway rs11031006 SNP was found between the endometriosis patients and controls.

entity.text: positive regulation of glucose transmembrane transport

sentence.text: We found a genetic association between rs11031006 (G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway) SNP and endometriosis.
negative regulation of gene expression and cell-cell adhesion genes constitute the most consistently associated genes with endometriosis.

In the present study, an association of rs7521902 (negative regulation of gene expression) and rs10859871 (cell-cell adhesion) was confirmed in women with endometriosis at the genotypic but not the allelic level
